review_data.title: Delicious Turkish Pide
review_data.content: We happened upon this little restaurant while wandering the streets of Zurich and we were so glad we went in. The Turkish pide, like a half moon pizza, was delicious and our server was pleasant and efficient!

review_data.title: Schlechter Falafel
review_data.content: Der Falafel war geschmacklich wirklich nicht gut. :( Die Falafel waren abgebrannt und sehr fertig, sie schmeckten nach sehr wenig.

review_data.title: Small place
review_data.content: Small place with no atmosphere. Extensive menu. Mostly sandwiches and gyros. My wife and I had the chicken nuggets dinner. Just so-so.

review_data.title: Good service, friendly staff, nice menu

review_data.title: 1001 Restaurant and Take Away
review_data.content: One of the best restaurants, Turkish restaurants, I been too. The kebabs were really nice. About 8.50 CHF a kebab. I went there about 3 times. For me was a good place to taste the Turkish food in Zurich!
